page.title: 16CLOCK GARAGE
page.content: Mr and Mrs Tabb own Clock Garage. Once Clock Garage was burnt down and was rebuilt in the 1930s . It is open from 7am to 8pm . The Garage is open every day of the year apart from Christmas Day. They sell up to 8-9000 gallons of petrol a week. In the winter they sell up to 2-3000 gallons. When Summercourt Fair people come, the garage sells lots of diesel for lorries but because the A.30 is closed all that day so they sell little petrol. Five people work in the garage all together, three in the garage and two on the forecourt. Caravans are for sale around the garage but these are being sold by another company. The garage people hope there will be a diversion of the proposed village by pass so that the new road still brings traffic by the garage.
